title: 150kg of KG worth Rs.45 Mn seized
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Three suspects have been arrested with 150kg of Kerala cannabis.
The arrests were made during a raid by the Sri Lanka Navy off the Delft Island in Jaffna.
The suspects were aged 22 and 49, residents of the Mannar and Pesalai areas.
